short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Heretic.School's Chrome Extension to answer questions and generate projects. Now with Voice Chat Mode!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Heretic.School is a next-gen learning platform designed to unlock the full potential of highly motivated teens aged 13-18. By providing hyper-personalized content and real-world projects related to their dream careers and interests, students build mastery in their fields and a love of learning.

Our Chrome Extension is the link between a student's personalized content recommendations and completing their custom-designed projects, by allowing them to get feedback and assistance while reading/watching.
